data.prayer: Jesus, strengthen the church in Ardennes, Grand Est, France by giving a prophet, as you said you would, who is bold and willing to correct. Lord, may the believers care about holiness as you do.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Ardennes, Grand Est, France
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Ardennes, Grand Est, France a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 81 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, we pray the believers are good spiritual stewards of their everyday relationships in Ardennes, Grand Est, France.
Lord, let it be said of the 288,115 lost in Ardennes that you have called them out of darkness into your glorious light.
data.verse: But you are a chosen race, a royal priesthood, a holy nation, a people for God’s own possession, that you may proclaim the excellence of him who called you out of darkness into his marvelous light

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Charleville-Mézières
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Charleville-Mézières, Grand Est, France.
Father, we ask for 58 new simple churches in the county of Ardennes, Grand Est, France. Place a simple church in every community of the 291,700 people living here.
data.verse: And blessed be His glorious name forever; And may the whole earth be filled with His glory. Amen, and Amen.

data.prayer: Spirit, please equip every disciple to make disciples who make disciples in the county of Ardennes.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.prayer: Lord, the believers in the county of Ardennes, Grand Est, France need teachers who can feed them with knowledge and understanding. Please raise them up.
data.verse: Then I will give you shepherds after My own heart, who will feed you with knowledge and understanding.
